revised_title: Kew Observatory Committee's Report on Magnetic and Meteorological Observations in 1898
tldr: The Kew Observatory Committee reports on the magnetic and meteorological observations conducted in 1898. They discuss magnetic storms, the changes in magnetic elements, and the impact of temperature on these observations. The committee also provides information on the instruments used, their maintenance, and the meteorological data collected during the year.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Earth's Magnetic Field
